name: Fatebringer
description:
The is a mythical weapon of great power found in the Eternity Vault. The Fatebringer is a blaster pistol with the following statistics:

Martial ranged weapon, 1d6 lightning damage, 30/120. Light, reload 10.

***Explosive Rounds.*** The Fatebringer's rounds are explosive, dealing an extra 1d4 fire damage to the target on a hit. Additionally, each creature within 5ft of the target that fails a DC 12 dexterity saving throw takes this damage as well.

***Firefly.*** The Fatebringer lands critical hits on a 19/20. When a critical hit occurs, an explosion engulfs the target. Each creature within 10ft of the target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, or take 1d6 lightning damage. A successful save reduces the damage taken by half, but the target fails the save regardless of the result.

***Outlaw.*** When you get a kill with this weapon, you can reload as a free action during the same turn.
